SEARCH

Klasse Kaffeemaschine

java.lang.Object
Kaffeemaschine
public class Kaffeemaschine extends Object
Represents a coffee machine with the ability to brew different types of coffee. the machine can be turned on/off, filled with water and coffee beans, and can prepate espesso, latte, or cappuccino.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    Kaffeemaschine()
    Default contructor initializes a coffee machine with: -power off state - Water capacity: 2000.0 ml - Bean capacity: 1000 g
    Kaffeemaschine(boolean eingeschaltet, double wasserfuellstand, double wasserKapazitaet, int bohnenFuellstand, int bohnenKapazitaet)
    Parameterized constructor for creating a customized coffee machine.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • Kaffeemaschine

      public Kaffeemaschine()
      Default contructor initializes a coffee machine with: -power off state - Water capacity: 2000.0 ml - Bean capacity: 1000 g

    • Kaffeemaschine

      public Kaffeemaschine(boolean eingeschaltet, double wasserfuellstand, double wasserKapazitaet, int bohnenFuellstand, int bohnenKapazitaet)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a customized coffee machine.
      Parameter:
      eingeschaltet - initial power state
      wasserfuellstand - initial water level
      wasserKapazitaet - water tank capacity
      bohnenFuellstand - initial bean amount
      bohnenKapazitaet - bean container capacity

  • Methodendetails

    • isEingeschaltet

      public boolean isEingeschaltet()
      Checks if the machine is powered on.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if powered on, false otherwise

    • getWasserfuellstand

      public double getWasserfuellstand()
      Gets the current water level.
      Gibt zurück:
      current water level

    • getWasserKapazitaet

      public double getWasserKapazitaet()
      Gets the water tank capacity.
      Gibt zurück:
      maximum water capacity

    • getBohnenFuellstand

      public int getBohnenFuellstand()
      Gets the current bean amount.
      Gibt zurück:
      current bean amount

    • getBohnenKapazitaet

      public int getBohnenKapazitaet()
      Gets the bean container capacity.
      Gibt zurück:
      maximum bean capacity

    • setEingeschaltet

      public void setEingeschaltet(boolean eingeschaltet)
      Sets the power state of the machine.
      Parameter:
      eingeschaltet - true to turn on, false to turn off

    • setWasserfuellstand

      public void setWasserfuellstand(double wasserfuellstand)
      Sets the water level in the tank.
      Parameter:
      wasserfuellstand - new water level in milliliters
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is outside valid range (0 - wasserKapazitaet)

    • setWasserKapazitaet

      public void setWasserKapazitaet(double wasserKapazitaet)
      Sets the water tank capacity.
      Parameter:
      wasserKapazitaet - new water capacity in milliliters
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is outside valid range (500 - 2000 ml)

    • setBohnenFuellstand

      public void setBohnenFuellstand(int bohnenFuellstand)
      Sets the current bean amount.
      Parameter:
      bohnenFuellstand - new bean amount in grams
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is outside valid range (0 - bohnenKapazitaet)

    • setBohnenKapazitaet

      public void setBohnenKapazitaet(int bohnenKapazitaet)
      Sets the bean container capacity.
      Parameter:
      bohnenKapazitaet - new bean capacity in grams
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if value is outside valid range (100 - 1000 g)

    • einschalten

      public void einschalten()
      Turns the coffee machine on. Prints status message if already powered on.

    • ausschalten

      public void ausschalten()
      Turns the coffee machine off. Prints status message if already powered off.

    • wasserAuffuellen

      public void wasserAuffuellen(double menge)
      Fills water into the machine's tank.
      Parameter:
      menge - amount of water to add in milliliters

    • bohnenAuffuellen

      public void bohnenAuffuellen(int menge)
      Fills coffee beans into the machine's container.
      Parameter:
      menge - amount of beans to add in grams

    • kochen

      public void kochen(String art)
      Brews the selected coffee type if sufficient resources are available. Requires machine to be powered on and minimum 200ml water available.
      Parameter:
      art - coffee type ("Espresso", "Latte", or "Cappuccino", case-insensitive)
